abstract: Citigroup said late Thursday that its Primerica life insurance unit had filed plans for an initial public offering of its stock.
snippet: Citigroup said late Thursday that its Primerica life insurance unit had filed plans for an initial public offering of its stock.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said late Thursday that its Primerica life insurance unit had filed plans for an initial public offering of its stock. The bank said it would sell the rest of Primerica after the unit goes public, as part of its efforts to divest itself of operations outside of its main banking business.

headline.main: Citigroup Plans I.P.O. of Its Primerica Unit
